name: dafrankort.github.io
excerpt: Explore a portfolio showcasing projects developed with React and Typescript, supported by a bespoke Python tool to manage project data and integrate with GitHub and OpenAI APIs.
description: A portfolio website showcasing the projects I have worked on and created. The website is developed using React and Typescript for the front-end. A convenient Python tool was also devised to simplify the process of updating project data and creating new project pages, with the added functionality of integrating with the GitHub and OpenAI APIs.
